genius.core.boaframework

Class BOAagentBilateral

  • java.lang.Object
    • genius.core.AgentAdapter
      • genius.core.Agent
        • genius.core.boaframework.BOAagentBilateral
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    NegotiationParty, java.io.Serializable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    AverageTitForTat1, AverageTitForTat2, BenchmarkReloaded, InoxAgent, OppositionCalculator, RandomBOAagent, RLBOAagentBilateral, SimpleBOAagent, TheBOAagent, TheNegotiatorReloaded
    Deprecated.

    @Deprecated
public abstract class BOAagentBilateral
extends Agent
    This class describes a basic decoupled agent. Available for backwards compatibility with old bilateral BOA agents. The TheBOAagent class extends this class and sets the required parameters. For more information, see: Baarslag T., Hindriks K.V., Hendrikx M., Dirkzwager A., Jonker C.M. Decoupling Negotiating Agents to Explore the Space of Negotiation Strategies. Proceedings of The Fifth International Workshop on Agent-based Complex Automated Negotiations (ACAN 2012), 2012. https://homepages.cwi.nl/~baarslag/pub/Decoupling_Negotiating_Agents_to_Explore_the_Space_of_Negotiation_Strategies_ACAN_2012.pdf
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
